    • Method Detail

      • addAllNodes

        public java.util.stream.Stream<FreeTextSearch.IndexStats> addAllNodes(java.lang.String index,
                                                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> structure,
                                                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> options)
        Create (or recreate) a free text search index.

        This will populate the index with all currently matching data. Updates will not be reflected in the index. In order to get updates into the index, the index has to be rebuilt.

        Parameters:
        index - The name of the index to create.
        structure - The labels of nodes to index, and the properties to index for each label.
        Returns:
        a stream containing a single element that describes the created index.

      • addAllNodesExtended

        @Deprecated
public java.util.stream.Stream<FreeTextSearch.IndexStats> addAllNodesExtended(java.lang.String index,
                                                                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> structure,
                                                                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> options)
        Deprecated. Will not be needed as of Neo4j 3.1. TODO: remove in one of next release
        Create (or recreate) a free text search index.

        This will populate the index with all currently matching data. Updates will not be reflected in the index. In order to get updates into the index, the index has to be rebuilt.

        Parameters:
        index - The name of the index to create.
        structure - The labels of nodes to index, and the properties to index for each label.
        options - Additional options which can be evaluated by the index provider.
        Returns:
        a stream containing a single element that describes the created index.

      • search

        public java.util.stream.Stream<WeightedNodeResult> search(java.lang.String index,
                                                          java.lang.String query)
                                                   throws org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.ParseException
        Search in the specified index for nodes matching the the given value.

        Any indexed property is searched.

        Parameters:
        index - The name of the index to search in.
        query - The query specifying what to search for.
        Returns:
        a stream of all matching nodes.
        Throws:
        org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.ParseException
